statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ 24 \\ 3 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 45 \\ -61 \\ -8 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ 24 \\ 3 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 45 \\ -61 \\ -8 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
